channel.title: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working
channel.description:
Hello people, straight to it.
When attempting to play the game sometimes it will crash at Fallouts start menu, after pressing launch from steam, but if i re-try itll run and go into game, from the game menu, if i select new game load etc, itll will crash about 10 seconds into the loading screen, resize window with nothing (blank/black) and Windows error will appear as in thread title.
Tried different setups of low quality etc, different resoultions, and if this helps.
Event Viewer :
Faulting application name: FalloutNV.exe, version: 1.1.1.271, time stamp: 0x4cc0aa87 Faulting module name: FalloutNV.exe, version: 1.1.1.271, time stamp: 0x4cc0aa87 Exception code: 0xc0000005 Fault offset: 0x0074f9c9 Faulting process id: 0x156c Faulting application start time: 0x01cb743ffd224615 Faulting application path: c:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\fallout new vegas\FalloutNV.exe Faulting module path: c:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\fallout new vegas\FalloutNV.exe Report Id: 576aaf43-e033-11df-8b6b-485b392856a0
Any help here would be appreciated. :frowning:
(note, this game has run before, just once.)

item.title: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Madcat1030:

Obligatory stupid question: have you verified cache integrity?

Yes.

DEATH eVADER:

Also have you got AsusOSD installed, because that crashes the game (and Fallout 3)

Didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
I left re-installing as the final option. i had to go through alot of crap before to get stalker running aswell.

Ive tried brand new games etc Adam, and that hasn’t worked.

Read full topic
item.source: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working

item.title: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Have you tried loading a different save from the load screen? It’s possible your save could be corrupted, this happened to me on the weekend.

Re-installing is an option as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working

item.title: Fallout New Vegas Has Stopped Working

item.description:
Hello people, straight to it.

When attempting to play the game sometimes it will crash at Fallouts start menu, after pressing launch from steam, but if i re-try itll run and go into game, from the game menu, if i select new game load etc, itll will crash about 10 seconds into the loading screen, resize window with nothing (blank/black) and Windows error will appear as in thread title.

Tried different setups of low quality etc, different resoultions, and if this helps.
